## Specios {-}

```{python results = "asis", echo=FALSE}
import re

f = open("../README.md", "r")
while True:
    line = f.readline()
    if not line:
        break
    if re.search("^#+ Manifest des Specios$", line):
        break

while True:
    line = f.readline()
    if not line:
        break
    if line.startswith("#") or line.startswith("---"):
        break
    print(line, end='')
```

Viel Spaß beim Lesen!
